mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.categoria, u.fabricante, u.disponible, u.idequipo FROM elemento as u WHERE id = #{id};

SELECT * FROM elemento WHERE disponible = True AND categoria = #{categoria};
SELECT * FROM elemento WHERE disponible = True AND fabricante = #{fabricante};
SELECT * FROM elemento ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM elemento ORDER BY categoria ASC;
